section.p: Known Subclasses: Discharge Summary, Continuity Of Care Document, Unstructured Document, Consultation Note, History And Physical Note, Operative Note, Procedure Note, Progress Note, Diagnostic Imaging Report, US Realm Header (V3)

This section describes constraints that apply to the header for all documents within the scope of this implementation guide. Header constraints specific to each document type are described in the appropriate document-specific section below
Document Type Codes CDA R2 states that LOINC is the preferred vocabulary for document type codes, which specify the type of document being exchanged (e.g., History and Physical). Each document type in this guide recommends a single preferred clinicalDocument/code, with further specification provided by author or performer, setting, or specialty

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:5252, CONF:10036 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.1"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] realmCode/@code="US" (CONF:16791)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] typeId (CONF:5361, R2.1=CONF:1198-5361)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:5363, R2.1=CONF:1198-5363)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:5253, R2.1=CONF:1198-5253)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:5254)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:5256, R2.1=CONF:1198-5256)
Signifies the document creation time, when the document first came into being. Where the CDA document is a transform from an original document in some other format, the ClinicalDocument.effectiveTime is the time the original document is created. The time when the transform occurred is not currently represented in CDA

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] confidentialityCode, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet HL7 BasicConfidentialityKind 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.16926 STATIC 2010-04-21 (CONF:5259, R2.1=CONF:1198-5259)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] languageCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Language 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.11526 DYNAMIC (CONF:5372, R2.1=CONF:1198-5372, DSTU:806)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] setId (CONF:5261, R2.1=CONF:1198-5261)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] versionNumber (CONF:5264, R2.1=CONF:1198-5264)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] recordTarget such that it (CONF:5266)
The recordTarget records the patient whose health information is described by the clinical document; it must contain at least one patientRole element.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patientRole such that it (CONF:5268)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5268, R2.1=CONF:1198-5268)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:5271, R2.1=CONF:1198-5271)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:5280, R2.1=CONF:1198-5280)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patient such that it (CONF:1198-5283)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5284, CONF:10411, R2.1=CONF:1198-5284, DSTU:808)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] administrativeGenderCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Administrative Gender (HL7 V3) 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.1 DYNAMIC (CONF:6394, R2.1=CONF:1198-6394)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] birthTime (CONF:5298)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] maritalStatusCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet HL7 Marital Status 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12212 DYNAMIC (CONF:5303, R2.1=CONF:1198-5303)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] religiousAffiliationCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet HL7 Religious Affiliation 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.19185 DYNAMIC (CONF:5317, R2.1=CONF:1198-5317)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] raceCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Race 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.14914 DYNAMIC (CONF:5322)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] sDTCRaceCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Race 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.14914 DYNAMIC (CONF:7263, R2.1=CONF:1198-7263)
Note: The sdtc:raceCode is only used to record additional values when the patient has indicated multiple races or additional race detail beyond the five categories required for Meaningful Use Stage 2. The prefix sdtc: SHALL be bound to the namespace "urn:hl7-org:sdtc". The use of the namespace provides a necessary extension to CDA R2 for the use of the additional raceCode elements.
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] ethnicGroupCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Ethnicity Value Set 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.837 DYNAMIC (CONF:5323)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] guardian such that it (CONF:5325)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:5326)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] addr (CONF:5359, CONF:10413, R2.1=CONF:1198-5359)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] telecom
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] guardianPerson such that it (CONF:5385, R2.1=CONF:1198-5385)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5386, R2.1=CONF:1198-5386)
The content of name SHALL be a conformant US Realm Person Name (PTN.US.FIELDED) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.1.1) (CONF:10414, R2.1=CONF:1198-5386)
The guardian code, if present, SHALL be selected from ValueSet PersonalRelationshipRoleType 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.19563 DYNAMIC or ValueSet Responsible Party 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.19830 DYNAMIC (CONF:5326)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] birthplace such that it (CONF:5395)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] place such that it (CONF:5396)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:5397, R2.1=CONF:1198-5397)
This addr SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] country, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Country 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.63 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-5404, R2.1=CONF:1198-5404)
This addr MAY contain zero or one [0..1] postalCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet PostalCodeValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.2 DYNAMIC (CONF:5403, R2.1=CONF:1198-5403)
If country is US, this addr SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] state, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet StateValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.1 DYNAMIC (CONF:5402)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] languageCommunication such that it (CONF:5406)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] languageCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Language 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.11526 DYNAMIC (CONF:5407, DSTU:806)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] modeCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet HL7 LanguageAbilityMode 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12249 STATIC 1 (CONF:5409, R2.1=CONF:1198-5409)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] proficiencyLevelCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet LanguageAbilityProficiency 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12199 DYNAMIC (CONF:9965, R2.1=CONF:1198-9965)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] preferenceInd (CONF:5414)
If sdtc:raceCode is present, then the patient SHALL contain [1..1] raceCode (CONF:31347, R2.1=CONF:1198-31347)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] providerOrganization such that it (CONF:5416, R2.1=CONF:1198-5416)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5417, R2.1=CONF:1198-5417)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5419, R2.1=CONF:1198-5419)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:5420, R2.1=CONF:1198-5420)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:5422, R2.1=CONF:1198-5422)
The id SHOULD include zero or one [0..1] id where id/@root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:9996, R2.1=CONF:1198-16820)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] componentOf such that it (CONF:9955)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] encompassingEncounter such that it (CONF:9956)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:9959, R2.1=CONF:1198-9959)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:9958, R2.1=CONF:1198-9958)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] author such that it (CONF:5444)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] time (CONF:5445, R2.1=CONF:1198-5445)
The content SHALL be a conformant US Realm Date and Time (DTM.US.FIELDED) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.4) (CONF:16866).
The content SHALL be a conformant US Realm Date and Time (DTM.US.FIELDED) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.4) (CONF:16866).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedAuthor such that it (CONF:5448)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5449, R2.1=CONF:1198-5449)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:16787), which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Healthcare Provider Taxonomy (HIPAA) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.1066 DYNAMIC (CONF:16788)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:5452, R2.1=CONF:1198-5452)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:5428, R2.1=CONF:1198-5428)
contain zero or one [0..1] assignedAuthoringDevice such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturerModelName (CONF:16784, R2.1=CONF:1198-16784)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] softwareName (CONF:16785, R2.1=CONF:1198-16785)
contain zero or one [0..1] assignedPerson such that it
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:16789, R2.1=CONF:1198-16789)
There SHALL be exactly one assignedAuthor/assignedPerson or exactly one assignedAuthor/assignedAuthoringDevice (CONF:16790, R2.1=CONF:1198-16790)
If this assignedAuthor is an assignedPerson, the assignedAuthor SHOULD contain zero to one [0..1] id 'such that it': MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor="UNK" Unknown (CodeSystem: HL7NullFlavor 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1008), SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier, and SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @extension (CONF:31135, CONF:31694, R2.1=CONF:1198-32882, R2.1=CONF:1198-32883, R2.1=CONF:1198-32884, R2.1=CONF:1198-32885)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] dataEnterer such that it (CONF:5441)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:5442)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5443, R2.1=CONF:1198-5443)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.101 NUCC Health Care Provider Taxonomy) (CONF:9944)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:5460, R2.1=CONF:1198-5460)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:5466, R2.1=CONF:1198-5466)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedPerson such that it (CONF:5469, R2.1=CONF:1198-5469)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5470, R2.1=CONF:1198-5470)
id SHOULD include zero or one [0..1] @root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:16821, R2.1=CONF:1198-16821)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] custodian such that it (CONF:5519)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedCustodian such that it (CONF:5520, R2.1=CONF:1198-5520)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] representedCustodianOrganization such that it (CONF:5521, R2.1=CONF:1198-5521)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5522, R2.1=CONF:1198-5522)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:5524, R2.1=CONF:1198-5524)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:5525, R2.1=CONF:1198-5525)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:5559, R2.1=CONF:1198-5559)
The id SHOULD include zero or one [0..1] @root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:16822, R2.1=CONF:1198-16822)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] informationRecipient such that it (CONF:5565)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] intendedRecipient such that it (CONF:5566)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] informationRecipient such that it (CONF:5568, R2.1=CONF:1198-5567)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5470, R2.1=CONF:1198-5568)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] receivedOrganization such that it (CONF:5577, R2.1=CONF:1198-5577)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:5578, R2.1=CONF:1198-5578)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] legalAuthenticator such that it (CONF:5579)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] time (CONF:5580, R2.1=CONF:1198-5580)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] signatureCode (CONF:5583, R2.1=CONF:1198-5583)/@code="S" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.89 Participationsignature) (CONF:5584, R2.1=CONF:1198-5584)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:5585, R2.1=CONF:1198-5585)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5586, R2.1=CONF:1198-5586)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Healthcare Provider Taxonomy (HIPAA) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.1066 DYNAMIC (CONF:17000, R2.1=CONF:1198-17000)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:5589, R2.1=CONF:1198-5589)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:5595, R2.1=CONF:1198-5595)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedPerson such that it (CONF:5597, R2.1=CONF:1198-5597)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5598, R2.1=CONF:1198-5598)
The id MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:16823, R2.1=CONF:1198-16823)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] authenticator such that it (CONF:5607)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] time (CONF:5608, R2.1=CONF:1198-5608)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] signatureCode (CONF:5610, R2.1=CONF:1198-5610)/@code="S" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.89 Participationsignature) (CONF:5611, R2.1=CONF:1198-5611)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:5612, R2.1=CONF:1198-5612)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5613, R2.1=CONF:1198-5613)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:16825, R2.1=CONF:1198-16825), which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Healthcare Provider Taxonomy (HIPAA) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.1066 DYNAMIC (CONF:16826, R2.1=CONF:1198-16826)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:5616, R2.1=CONF:1198-5616)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:5622, R2.1=CONF:1198-5622)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedPerson such that it (CONF:5624, R2.1=CONF:1198-5624)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5625, R2.1=CONF:1198-5625)
The id SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:16824, R2.1=CONF:1198-16824)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] informant such that it (CONF:8001)
contain zero or one [0..1] assignedEntity such that it
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:9945, R2.1=CONF:1198-9945)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.101 NUCC Health Care Provider Taxonomy) (CONF:9947)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] addr (CONF:8220)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedPerson such that it (CONF:8221, R2.1=CONF:1198-8221)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:8222, CONF:10420, R2.1=CONF:1198-8222)
The id SHOULD include zero or one [0..1] id where id/@root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:9946, R2.1=CONF:1198-9946)
contain zero or one [0..1] relatedEntity such that it
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] addr (CONF:8220)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] relatedPerson such that it (CONF:8221)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:8222, CONF:10420, R2.1=CONF:1198-8222)
SHALL satisfy: contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity OR exactly one [1..1] relatedEntity (CONF:8002)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] participant such that it (CONF:10003)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] time (CONF:10004, R2.1=CONF:1198-10004)
Such participants, if present, SHALL have an associatedPerson or scopingOrganization element under participant/associatedEntity. (CONF:10006)
Unless otherwise specified by the document specific header constraints, when participant/@typeCode is IND, associatedEntity/@classCode SHALL be selected from ValueSet INDRoleclassCodes 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.33 STATIC 2011-09-30. (CONF:10007)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] inFulfillmentOf such that it (CONF:9952)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] order such that it (CONF:9953, R2.1=CONF:1198-9953)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:9954, R2.1=CONF:1198-9954)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] documentationOf such that it (CONF:14835)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] serviceEvent such that it (CONF:14836)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:14837, R2.1=CONF:1198-14837)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] performer such that it (CONF:14839)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode (CONF:14840, R2.1=CONF:1198-14840)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] functionCode (CONF:16818), which SHOULD be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.88 ParticipationFunction) (CONF:16819)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:14841)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:14846, R2.1=CONF:1198-14846)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:14842), which SHOULD be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.101 NUCC Health Care Provider Taxonomy) (CONF:14843)
The id SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:14847, R2.1=CONF:1198-14847)
effectiveTime SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] low (CONF:14838, R2.1=CONF:1198-14838)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] authorization such that it (CONF:16792)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] consent such that it (CONF:16793, R2.1=CONF:1198-16793)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:16794, R2.1=CONF:1198-16794)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:16795, R2.1=CONF:1198-16795)
The type of consent (e.g., a consent to perform the related serviceEvent) is conveyed in consent/code.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:16797, R2.1=CONF:1198-16797)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:16798, R2.1=CONF:1198-16798)
typeId SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.1.3" (CONF:5250, R2.1=CONF:1198-5250)
typeId SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="POCD_HD000040" (CONF:5251, R2.1=CONF:1198-5251)
id SHALL be a globally unique identifier for the document (CONF:9991, R2.1=CONF:1198-9991)
code SHALL specify the particular kind of document (e.g. History and Physical, Discharge Summary, Progress Note). (CONF:9992, R2.1=CONF:1198-9992)
If setId is present versionNumber SHALL be present (CONF:6380, R2.1=CONF:1198-6380)
If versionNumber is present setId SHALL be present (CONF:6387, R2.1=CONF:1198-6387)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] realmCode/@code="US" (CONF:16791)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] typeId (CONF:5361, R2.1=CONF:1198-5361)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:5363, R2.1=CONF:1198-5363)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:5253, R2.1=CONF:1198-5253)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:5254)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:5256, R2.1=CONF:1198-5256)
Signifies the document creation time, when the document first came into being. Where the CDA document is a transform from an original document in some other format, the ClinicalDocument.effectiveTime is the time the original document is created. The time when the transform occurred is not currently represented in CDA

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] confidentialityCode, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet HL7 BasicConfidentialityKind 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.16926 STATIC 2010-04-21 (CONF:5259, R2.1=CONF:1198-5259)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] languageCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Language 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.11526 DYNAMIC (CONF:5372, R2.1=CONF:1198-5372, DSTU:806)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] setId (CONF:5261, R2.1=CONF:1198-5261)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] versionNumber (CONF:5264, R2.1=CONF:1198-5264)

contain exactly one [1..1] component, where its type is Component2
Conforms to Component2

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] recordTarget such that it (CONF:5266)
The recordTarget records the patient whose health information is described by the clinical document; it must contain at least one patientRole element.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patientRole such that it (CONF:5268)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5268, R2.1=CONF:1198-5268)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:5271, R2.1=CONF:1198-5271)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:5280, R2.1=CONF:1198-5280)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patient such that it (CONF:1198-5283)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5284, CONF:10411, R2.1=CONF:1198-5284, DSTU:808)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] administrativeGenderCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Administrative Gender (HL7 V3) 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.1 DYNAMIC (CONF:6394, R2.1=CONF:1198-6394)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] birthTime (CONF:5298)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] maritalStatusCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet HL7 Marital Status 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12212 DYNAMIC (CONF:5303, R2.1=CONF:1198-5303)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] religiousAffiliationCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet HL7 Religious Affiliation 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.19185 DYNAMIC (CONF:5317, R2.1=CONF:1198-5317)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] raceCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Race 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.14914 DYNAMIC (CONF:5322)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] sDTCRaceCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Race 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.14914 DYNAMIC (CONF:7263, R2.1=CONF:1198-7263)
Note: The sdtc:raceCode is only used to record additional values when the patient has indicated multiple races or additional race detail beyond the five categories required for Meaningful Use Stage 2. The prefix sdtc: SHALL be bound to the namespace "urn:hl7-org:sdtc". The use of the namespace provides a necessary extension to CDA R2 for the use of the additional raceCode elements.
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] ethnicGroupCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Ethnicity Value Set 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.837 DYNAMIC (CONF:5323)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] guardian such that it (CONF:5325)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:5326)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] addr (CONF:5359, CONF:10413, R2.1=CONF:1198-5359)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] telecom
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] guardianPerson such that it (CONF:5385, R2.1=CONF:1198-5385)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5386, R2.1=CONF:1198-5386)
The content of name SHALL be a conformant US Realm Person Name (PTN.US.FIELDED) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.1.1) (CONF:10414, R2.1=CONF:1198-5386)
The guardian code, if present, SHALL be selected from ValueSet PersonalRelationshipRoleType 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.19563 DYNAMIC or ValueSet Responsible Party 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.19830 DYNAMIC (CONF:5326)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] birthplace such that it (CONF:5395)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] place such that it (CONF:5396)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:5397, R2.1=CONF:1198-5397)
This addr SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] country, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Country 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.63 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-5404, R2.1=CONF:1198-5404)
This addr MAY contain zero or one [0..1] postalCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet PostalCodeValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.2 DYNAMIC (CONF:5403, R2.1=CONF:1198-5403)
If country is US, this addr SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] state, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet StateValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.1 DYNAMIC (CONF:5402)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] languageCommunication such that it (CONF:5406)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] languageCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Language 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.11526 DYNAMIC (CONF:5407, DSTU:806)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] modeCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet HL7 LanguageAbilityMode 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12249 STATIC 1 (CONF:5409, R2.1=CONF:1198-5409)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] proficiencyLevelCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet LanguageAbilityProficiency 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12199 DYNAMIC (CONF:9965, R2.1=CONF:1198-9965)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] preferenceInd (CONF:5414)
If sdtc:raceCode is present, then the patient SHALL contain [1..1] raceCode (CONF:31347, R2.1=CONF:1198-31347)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] providerOrganization such that it (CONF:5416, R2.1=CONF:1198-5416)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5417, R2.1=CONF:1198-5417)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5419, R2.1=CONF:1198-5419)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:5420, R2.1=CONF:1198-5420)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:5422, R2.1=CONF:1198-5422)
The id SHOULD include zero or one [0..1] id where id/@root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:9996, R2.1=CONF:1198-16820)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] componentOf such that it (CONF:9955)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] encompassingEncounter such that it (CONF:9956)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:9959, R2.1=CONF:1198-9959)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:9958, R2.1=CONF:1198-9958)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] author such that it (CONF:5444)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] time (CONF:5445, R2.1=CONF:1198-5445)
The content SHALL be a conformant US Realm Date and Time (DTM.US.FIELDED) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.4) (CONF:16866).
The content SHALL be a conformant US Realm Date and Time (DTM.US.FIELDED) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.4) (CONF:16866).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedAuthor such that it (CONF:5448)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5449, R2.1=CONF:1198-5449)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:16787), which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Healthcare Provider Taxonomy (HIPAA) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.1066 DYNAMIC (CONF:16788)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:5452, R2.1=CONF:1198-5452)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:5428, R2.1=CONF:1198-5428)
contain zero or one [0..1] assignedAuthoringDevice such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturerModelName (CONF:16784, R2.1=CONF:1198-16784)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] softwareName (CONF:16785, R2.1=CONF:1198-16785)
contain zero or one [0..1] assignedPerson such that it
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:16789, R2.1=CONF:1198-16789)
There SHALL be exactly one assignedAuthor/assignedPerson or exactly one assignedAuthor/assignedAuthoringDevice (CONF:16790, R2.1=CONF:1198-16790)
If this assignedAuthor is an assignedPerson, the assignedAuthor SHOULD contain zero to one [0..1] id 'such that it': MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor="UNK" Unknown (CodeSystem: HL7NullFlavor 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1008), SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier, and SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @extension (CONF:31135, CONF:31694, R2.1=CONF:1198-32882, R2.1=CONF:1198-32883, R2.1=CONF:1198-32884, R2.1=CONF:1198-32885)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] dataEnterer such that it (CONF:5441)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:5442)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5443, R2.1=CONF:1198-5443)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.101 NUCC Health Care Provider Taxonomy) (CONF:9944)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:5460, R2.1=CONF:1198-5460)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:5466, R2.1=CONF:1198-5466)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedPerson such that it (CONF:5469, R2.1=CONF:1198-5469)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5470, R2.1=CONF:1198-5470)
id SHOULD include zero or one [0..1] @root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:16821, R2.1=CONF:1198-16821)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] custodian such that it (CONF:5519)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedCustodian such that it (CONF:5520, R2.1=CONF:1198-5520)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] representedCustodianOrganization such that it (CONF:5521, R2.1=CONF:1198-5521)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5522, R2.1=CONF:1198-5522)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:5524, R2.1=CONF:1198-5524)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:5525, R2.1=CONF:1198-5525)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:5559, R2.1=CONF:1198-5559)
The id SHOULD include zero or one [0..1] @root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:16822, R2.1=CONF:1198-16822)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] informationRecipient such that it (CONF:5565)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] intendedRecipient such that it (CONF:5566)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] informationRecipient such that it (CONF:5568, R2.1=CONF:1198-5567)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5470, R2.1=CONF:1198-5568)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] receivedOrganization such that it (CONF:5577, R2.1=CONF:1198-5577)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:5578, R2.1=CONF:1198-5578)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] legalAuthenticator such that it (CONF:5579)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] time (CONF:5580, R2.1=CONF:1198-5580)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] signatureCode (CONF:5583, R2.1=CONF:1198-5583)/@code="S" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.89 Participationsignature) (CONF:5584, R2.1=CONF:1198-5584)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:5585, R2.1=CONF:1198-5585)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5586, R2.1=CONF:1198-5586)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Healthcare Provider Taxonomy (HIPAA) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.1066 DYNAMIC (CONF:17000, R2.1=CONF:1198-17000)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:5589, R2.1=CONF:1198-5589)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:5595, R2.1=CONF:1198-5595)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedPerson such that it (CONF:5597, R2.1=CONF:1198-5597)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5598, R2.1=CONF:1198-5598)
The id MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:16823, R2.1=CONF:1198-16823)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] authenticator such that it (CONF:5607)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] time (CONF:5608, R2.1=CONF:1198-5608)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] signatureCode (CONF:5610, R2.1=CONF:1198-5610)/@code="S" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.89 Participationsignature) (CONF:5611, R2.1=CONF:1198-5611)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:5612, R2.1=CONF:1198-5612)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5613, R2.1=CONF:1198-5613)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:16825, R2.1=CONF:1198-16825), which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Healthcare Provider Taxonomy (HIPAA) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.1066 DYNAMIC (CONF:16826, R2.1=CONF:1198-16826)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:5616, R2.1=CONF:1198-5616)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:5622, R2.1=CONF:1198-5622)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedPerson such that it (CONF:5624, R2.1=CONF:1198-5624)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5625, R2.1=CONF:1198-5625)
The id SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:16824, R2.1=CONF:1198-16824)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] informant such that it (CONF:8001)
contain zero or one [0..1] assignedEntity such that it
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:9945, R2.1=CONF:1198-9945)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.101 NUCC Health Care Provider Taxonomy) (CONF:9947)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] addr (CONF:8220)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedPerson such that it (CONF:8221, R2.1=CONF:1198-8221)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:8222, CONF:10420, R2.1=CONF:1198-8222)
The id SHOULD include zero or one [0..1] id where id/@root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:9946, R2.1=CONF:1198-9946)
contain zero or one [0..1] relatedEntity such that it
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] addr (CONF:8220)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] relatedPerson such that it (CONF:8221)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:8222, CONF:10420, R2.1=CONF:1198-8222)
SHALL satisfy: contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity OR exactly one [1..1] relatedEntity (CONF:8002)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] participant such that it (CONF:10003)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] time (CONF:10004, R2.1=CONF:1198-10004)
Such participants, if present, SHALL have an associatedPerson or scopingOrganization element under participant/associatedEntity. (CONF:10006)
Unless otherwise specified by the document specific header constraints, when participant/@typeCode is IND, associatedEntity/@classCode SHALL be selected from ValueSet INDRoleclassCodes 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.33 STATIC 2011-09-30. (CONF:10007)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] inFulfillmentOf such that it (CONF:9952)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] order such that it (CONF:9953, R2.1=CONF:1198-9953)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:9954, R2.1=CONF:1198-9954)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] documentationOf such that it (CONF:14835)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] serviceEvent such that it (CONF:14836)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:14837, R2.1=CONF:1198-14837)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] performer such that it (CONF:14839)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode (CONF:14840, R2.1=CONF:1198-14840)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] functionCode (CONF:16818), which SHOULD be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.88 ParticipationFunction) (CONF:16819)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:14841)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:14846, R2.1=CONF:1198-14846)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:14842), which SHOULD be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.101 NUCC Health Care Provider Taxonomy) (CONF:14843)
The id SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:14847, R2.1=CONF:1198-14847)
effectiveTime SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] low (CONF:14838, R2.1=CONF:1198-14838)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] authorization such that it (CONF:16792)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] consent such that it (CONF:16793, R2.1=CONF:1198-16793)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:16794, R2.1=CONF:1198-16794)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:16795, R2.1=CONF:1198-16795)
The type of consent (e.g., a consent to perform the related serviceEvent) is conveyed in consent/code.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:16797, R2.1=CONF:1198-16797)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:16798, R2.1=CONF:1198-16798)
typeId SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.1.3" (CONF:5250, R2.1=CONF:1198-5250)
typeId SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="POCD_HD000040" (CONF:5251, R2.1=CONF:1198-5251)
id SHALL be a globally unique identifier for the document (CONF:9991, R2.1=CONF:1198-9991)
code SHALL specify the particular kind of document (e.g. History and Physical, Discharge Summary, Progress Note). (CONF:9992, R2.1=CONF:1198-9992)
If setId is present versionNumber SHALL be present (CONF:6380, R2.1=CONF:1198-6380)
If versionNumber is present setId SHALL be present (CONF:6387, R2.1=CONF:1198-6387)
